A maara Bond maka iji ma "mgbasa ozi ochie" redio na "mgbasa ọhụrụ" podcasting. Ọ bụ onye na-enye onyinye mgbe niile na CBC Radio's Spark, ma na-ede maka Rabble.ca. Na CBC Radio, ọ bụ onye na-enyocha ihe nkiri na ọdịbendị ugboro ugboro na Definitely Not the Opera, mgbe ụfọdụ ọ pụtara dị ka onye na-eme mkparịta ụka na Saturday Night na Movies malite n'afọ  1999. Dị ka onye na-eme ihe ngosi, ọ na-akwado Reel Women, ihe nkiri na-eme kwa izu na onye Canada na-ahụ maka ụmụ nwanyị na onye edemede Judy Rebick

Ọ na-esokwa na-akwado The Sniffer, pọdkastị banyere teknụzụ na ọnọdụ, ya na Nora Young, kemgbe ọ dịkarịa ala afọ 2006. Ọ bụ onye na-elekọta podcast "Prosecast", usoro ajụjụ ọnụ ya na ndị edemede Canada nke HarperCollins Canada kwadoro. Akwụkwọ akụkọ Bond bụ Night Town ka Iguana Books bipụtara n'afọ 2013
Ọ bụ akụkọ na-eme na 1970s Toronto.
